mapper.select: select person.person_id, b.book_img, b.book_name,b.book_m_price, pay.pay_id, pay.pay_date, b.person_id from person person, book b, pay pay, pick pick where person.person_id = pick.person_id and pick.book_id = b.book_id and pick.pick_id = pay.pick_id and person.person_id = #{person_id}
select m.mileage_date,m.mileage_kind,m.mileage_point, p.person_id,m.MILEAGE_ID from person p, MILEAGE m where p.person_id = m.person_id and p.person_id = #{person_id}

SELECT b.book_img, b.book_name, p2.person_name,b.BOOK_M_PRICE,b.BOOK_SELL_STATE, p.pick_state,p.pick_id from pick p, book b, person p2 WHERE p.book_id = b.book_id and b.person_id = p2.person_id and p.pick_state = 'Y' and p.person_id = #{person_id}
